TI: CA3 sees the big picture while dentate gyrus splits hairs.
AB: The dentate gyrus (DG) and area CA3 of the hippocampus have been long hypothesized to perform pattern separation and pattern completion, respectively. A new study published in this issue of Neuron, Neunuebel and Knierim (2014), provides strong empirical support for this functional dissociation.
